subject: Re: [d@DCC] Death by Copyright
body:
Darryl Moore wrote:
> Here is the letter that I am enclosing with the DVDs.

Do you have a French translation for the appropriate MPs ? My gut feeling is that those Bloc MPs would be much more likely to take notice of a letter in French with an accompanying DVD.

I know we have people on the list who are capable of translating it.

Chris
